Package cryptoTrader.models.brokerModel

Class Broker

java.lang.Object
cryptoTrader.models.brokerModel.Broker
public class Broker extends Object
This class represents a Broker object.
Author:
Yakup Tezcan, Wesley James Fortin, Reginald Pierre Harder, TSUNG-YING TSAI The Broker object has a name, a list of coin names, and a trading strategy. The Broker object also has a dictionary to count the number of strategies a broker uses.

  • Constructor Details

    • Broker

      public Broker​(String name, List<Coin> coinList, String strategy)
      This constructor sets the attributes of a Broker objects.
      Parameters:
      name - , the name of the broker.
      coinList - , the list of coins.
      strategy - , the trading strategy a broker has to perform a trade. This method also stores a dictionary to count the number of trading strategies a broker used to perform a trade.

  • Method Details

      Getter method for strategy dictionary
      Returns:
      returns the dictionary of trading strategies used by a broker.

      public void incrementStrategyDictionary()
      This method increments the number of a trading strategy used by a broker.

      This method sets the trading a broker has to perform a trade.
